channel.title: Runeshock: UPDATED MEDIA!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/140vgd5.png[/img]
[i][b]Client Download:[/b][/i] https://www.dropbox.com/s/2pcz2yn8218e421/.Runeshock.jar?dl=0
[b][i]Cache Download:[/i][/b] https://www.dropbox.com/s/pbni8n90sbktex5/.RuneShock.zip?dl=0
[i][b]Media Images: [/b][/i] [url=http://share.pho.to/4e3pp]The World of Runeshock[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72Rvp]Commands + Prompts[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/72S6l]Travel[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72SAm]Bank[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72S0x]Tabs[/url] [url=http://share.pho.to/72SC3]Pets[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72Rob]Cooking[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72RqL]Crafting[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72RtC]Fishing[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72RuX]Fletching[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72RxS]Mining[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72Ryh]Prayer[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72Rzh]Smelting[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72S2c]Thieving[/url] [url=http://pho.to/72S9c]Woodcut[/url]
[i][b]Related Threads:[/b][/i] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657933.0.html]Runeshock Resting[/url] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657792.0.html]Runeshock Drops[/url] [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,659985.0.html]Runeshock Passive Mode[/url] [hr] [b][i]Complete:[/i][/b][i] [SPOILER=Complete] [i]Open Interface Stops Movement Object Name Detection NPC Name Detection NPC Clipping Player Clipping Region Clipping Path Finding Pet Handling Door Handling Ladder Handling Coffin Handling Manhole Handling Picking Cabbage Picking Potato Picking Onions Picking Wheat Picking Flax Fight Caves Duel Arena Bank Pin System Deposit Boxes Passive Mode X-Logging[/i][/spoiler] [hr] [i][b]Incomplete:[/b][/i] [SPOILER=Incomplete] [i]Player Resting Nazi Zombies Castle Wars Correct NPC Animations Correct NPC Drops Jumping Gates Jumping Stiles Trapdoor Handling[/i][/spoiler] [hr] [i][b]Updates/Information Logs:[/b][/i] [spoiler=Updates/Information Logs]X-logging whether against player or NPC will not sever your connection during combat. If you have passive mode disabled and EX-log, you will log on with passive mode still disabled. If you clicked the log-out button while passive mode is disabled, passive mode will be re-enabled by successful log out. Passive mode, and X-logging have been put into the complete section. Disabling passive mode gives you a white skull, and opens up an interface with, hp, prayer, energy, and a skull which you will not lose any items upon death. Attacking players will make that skull turn red and you will lose your items upon death.
Passive mode has been adjusted only for wilderness use, you will not be able to fight in city's no longer. It was a tough decision, but it seems it's better not to eliminate the wilderness. To keep our wilderness much more player killing civilized. You may activate/disable passive mode out of the wilderness. You will not be able to switch through passive mode while in the wilderness, so if you're just there to watch you will be in peace mode while in the wilderness, or if you just want to fight wilderness monsters, or train agility. Without being a threat to anyone, or being threatened by anyone.
On another note, stair cases and ladders are nearly 100 percent. Having some coordination errors, with player location when climbing ladders or staircases. Some offsets also need some fixing. [/spoiler] [/center]

item.title: Runeshock: UPDATED MEDIA!
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

slysteeler89:

So what kind of server is this? An oldschool eco? or a fun muck around server? Not sure as i’m seeing an oldschool layout, but with pets.

It’s is pretty much a remake with ‘summoning’, well a pets tab. Any who, thread hahs been updated with more images regarding the server. Feel free to click the named links, will be putting up more soon.

Read full topic

Correct NPC Drops
Jumping Gates
Jumping Stiles
Trapdoor Handling[/spoiler]
[hr]
Updates/Information Logs:
[spoiler=Updates/Information Logs]X-logging whether against player or NPC will not sever your connection during combat. If you have passive mode disabled and EX-log, you will log on with passive mode still disabled. If you clicked the log-out button while passive mode is disabled, passive mode will be re-enabled by successful log out. Passive mode, and X-logging have been put into the complete section. Disabling passive mode gives you a white skull, and opens up an interface with, hp, prayer, energy, and a skull which you will not lose any items upon death. Attacking players will make that skull turn red and you will lose your items upon death.

Passive mode has been adjusted only for wilderness use, you will not be able to fight in city’s no longer. It was a tough decision, but it seems it’s better not to eliminate the wilderness. To keep our wilderness much more player killing civilized. You may activate/disable passive mode out of the wilderness. You will not be able to switch through passive mode while in the wilderness, so if you’re just there to watch you will be in peace mode while in the wilderness, or if you just want to fight wilderness monsters, or train agility. Without being a threat to anyone, or being threatened by anyone.

On another note, stair cases and ladders are nearly 100 percent. Having some coordination errors, with player location when climbing ladders or staircases. Some offsets also need some fixing.
[/spoiler]
[/center]

Read full topic
